WRITING.TITLE: [Suggestion] Please give us a way to mass destroy blocks when customizing our cornerstones
WRITING.TEXT: The idea of having to go through 30 minutes of right-clicking just so i can re-customize my cornerstone is killing me. Can you guys just give us someway to, say, destroy a 2x2 square of block at a time ? I think this small change will really help to encourage people to create more awesome stuff with their cornerstones
It's a new neutral that roam the river on both side, poping every single mushroom on their way
The crab already ruined him, this is just salt to the wound
Are you using any graphic enhancement ? Game looks amazing. If so, can you share your preset
Can you share your build :D, been looking for one
i actually really like it :P
Thank you so much for the fast reply guys, it's overwhelming

WRITING.TITLE: My Trove Class Design
WRITING.TEXT: Glacial Warrior -A melee bruiser ice class that use ...well...ice to empower his/her attack Passive: haven't come up with this yet 1st skill: regular melee auto attack, but every third strike you slow the enemy for x% 2nd skill: release a cone of frost in front of you that damage the enemy and freeze ( or slow ) them, auto attacks on enemies affected by the effect deal extra damage 3rd skill: create an ice shield around you that reduces damage taken for a small amount and damages enemies that attack you Ultimate: You spin around ( whirlwind attack ) damage enemies around you and shoot out glacial lance at distant foes Ps: this is just a fun idea that i want to share, nothing serious. So please, give me your opinion, i would love to hear them Pss: Pardon my English

WRITING.TITLE: Adding Global Channel
WRITING.TEXT: Pardon my Enlgishto. Bought Gw2 about 2 years ago, and i love every aspect of the game, but it always seemed that the game failed to grab me, even though it's the only MMO i am willing to log in every update. And then i knew why, it's the lacking of social aspect. I live in Vietnam, not many people here play GW2, add up to that is my timezone. I couldn't join any guild because i would just end up logging in at 4am PST. I felt so disconnected, it was always just me running around maps, killing mobs, and it got boring in a while. Then i started playing Path of Exile, there was a global chat with multiple channel, and it was 24/24 busy with people talking trash, asking question....I felt so involved into this lively world even though there was no one with me on the map ( literally, all the maps are instance except for cities ) And i wonder, why don't we add this to Guild Wars 2. Of course, problems there will be but i have confidence that Anet will be able to fix them with no effort. Here are my fixes to the some of the problem Gold selling : Guild Wars 2 is buy-to-play, so i think preventing this would be pretty easy Chat Flooding : Dividing the global chat into channels, put a maximum amount of players on each one. Of course, like megaserver, priorities Friends, guildies..etc I would LOVE to see your opinion on this
